# Plumbing Repairs and Service

**Tender Title**: Plumbing Repairs and Service

**Reference Number**: cb-826-66951316
**Solicitation Number**: 5000082814

This **Request for Proposal (RFP)** invites eligible contractors to submit proposals for the provision of plumbing repair and service to the Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) facility at 335 River Road in Ottawa. The services required are for minor plumbing repairs and maintenance of facility equipment on an as-needed basis.

## Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: 2024-11-21
* **Closing Date**: 2025-01-07T15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2025-02-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2028-03-31

**Classification**: 
* UNSPSC Code: 72102300 - Plumbing and heating and air conditioning
* Trade Agreements: None

**Location**:
* Canada
* Ottawa (National Capital Region and 335 River Road)

This is an open tender, and all interested contractors are invited to submit proposals. A **competitive bidding process** will be employed, with the **selection criteria** based on variations or combinations of the proposed methods.

## Contracting Terms
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

For further information and to download the tender package, please visit:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52420/5000082814_solicitaton_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52420/5000082814_solicitaton_fr.pdf (French)
